title: Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site: Donate
body: Donate         A watercolor for a proposed gazebo for the Joseph P. Kennedy home in Hyannisport NPS/Olmsted NHS  Making Donations The National Park Service welcomes support from the private sector to supplement public funds appropriated by Congress. Donations come to the park from individuals, organizations, foundations, and corporations as expressions of support and enhance the ability of the National Park Service to carry out its programs and activities.  Please contact Superintendent Myra Harrison at 617-566-1689 ext.201
